description: A record that links a card to a collection.

main.description: A record representing the relationship between a card and a collection.

collection.description: Strong reference to the collection record.

card.description: Strong reference to the card record in the users library.

originalCard.description: Strong reference to the original card record (may be in another library).

addedBy.description: DID of the user who added the card to the collection

addedAt.description: Timestamp when the card was added to the collection.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when this link record was created (usually set by PDS).
